section.p: The dimension, quantity, or capacity determined by measuring a peice of equipment.

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] dimensionCode with data type Code
Indicates the dimensions of measuremnt for the equipment being used.

Contains exactly one [1..1] id with data type Id
Unique identifier for each type measurement of the equipment

Contains exactly one [1..1] value with data type Physical Quantity
Contains the result of the dimension, quantity, or capacity determined being measured.
Contains exactly one [1..1] device, where its type is Surgery Device

Contains exactly one [1..1] dimensionCode with data type Code
Indicates the dimensions of measuremnt for the equipment being used.

Contains exactly one [1..1] id with data type Id
Unique identifier for each type measurement of the equipment

Contains exactly one [1..1] value with data type Physical Quantity
Contains the result of the dimension, quantity, or capacity determined being measured.
Contains exactly one [1..1] device, where its type is Surgery Device
